action.description: The committee on PBS recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED.  The recommendation was not adopted.  The votes were as follows: 1 Ayes: Representative(s) Shimizu; Ayes with reservations: none; 8 Noes: Representative(s) Belatti, Iwamoto, Hashem, Ichiyama, Lamosao, Morikawa, Poepoe, Souza; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Woodson.
